text: Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.
author: Albert Camus

text: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

text: The most important thing is to read as much as you can, like I did. It will give you an understanding of what makes good writing and it will enlarge your vocabulary.
author: J. K. Rowling

text: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu
